basicInfo.notes: Founded 2010 in San Francisco. WebOps platform for WordPress and Drupal. Known for developer-friendly Git-based workflows, multidev environments, and Terminus CLI. Focus on agencies, enterprises, and educational institutions. Free sandbox sites for development.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: No money-back guarantee; Free dev sandbox available

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Visit-based pricing with overage protection (1 month free on annual plans); excess traffic charges reported by some users
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Excessive resource usage beyond plan limits
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Free dev sandbox; No money-back guarantee; Visit-based pricing can lead to surprise bills; Bot traffic charges reported; Elite plans expensive; Some users report excess traffic fees; Overage Protection on annual plans

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: WordPress and Drupal only; Developer-focused platform

editorial.knownIssues: Mixed reviews - G2 4.3 but Trustpilot 2.5; Expensive once past free tier; Bot traffic charges reported; No money-back guarantee; Visit-based billing can be confusing; Some major plugin compatibility issues; Not beginner-friendly; Complex for simple needs
editorial.bestFor: Drupal sites (primary specialty); WordPress agencies using Git workflows; Developers wanting multidev environments; Educational institutions; Organizations needing Dev/Test/Live workflow; Teams using CI/CD pipelines
editorial.avoidIf: Beginner or simple site needs; Budget-conscious; Want traditional cPanel; Need phone support; Prefer straightforward pricing; Concerned about traffic charges
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Unique Drupal + WordPress support; Git-based workflows; Multidev environments; Terminus CLI; Free sandbox sites; G2 4.3 good but Trustpilot 2.5 polarized; 99.95% uptime (99.99% with Multi-Zone); Visit-based pricing controversial

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: WebOps platform for WordPress AND Drupal with Git-based workflows, multidev environments, and Terminus CLI
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Agency or development team building WordPress/Drupal sites with Git workflows needing multidev environments

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: Pantheon is excellent for developers/agencies with G2 4.3. Polarized Trustpilot 2.5 reflects billing concerns. Best for Git-based WordPress/Drupal workflows.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: Pantheon is an independent, VC-backed company founded in 2010 in San Francisco. Focused on WebOps for WordPress and Drupal.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Basic plans from $50/month. Performance plans higher. Free dev sandbox available. No money-back guarantee but free trial.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: No. Pantheon is developer-focused with Git workflows. Not suitable for beginners expecting traditional hosting.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: No, Pantheon does not include email hosting.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, Pantheon supports both WordPress and Drupal with managed updates, staging (Dev/Test/Live), and Git workflows.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: Pantheon guarantees 99.95% uptime (99.99% with Multi-Zone Failover on Elite plans).
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, but no money-back guarantee. Free dev sandbox available for testing.
